commit.message:
Added language selection to login form

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1246094 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -24,6 +24,11 @@


+ +

@@ -2,4 +2,5 @@ title=Login module
 username=Username
 password=Password
 submit=Login
-reset=Reset
\ No newline at end of file
+reset=Reset
+language=Language
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -2,4 +2,5 @@ title=Modulo di accesso
 username=Nome utente
 password=Password
 submit=Entra
-reset=Annulla
\ No newline at end of file
+reset=Annulla
+language=Lingua
\ No newline at end of file
